name: BETAFPV Air75 Brushless Whoop Quadcopter, Ultralight 1S 75mm Micro Whoop Drone with G473 5IN1 Air Flight Controller ELRS Receiver, 0802SE 23000KV Motor, C03 FPV Camera, for FPV Drone Racing Freestyle
description: Ultralight 75mm Drone: Experience a new level of lightweight flying with our 1S 75mm indoor whoop. Weighing in at just 21g, equipped with Air canopy, Air75 brushless whoop frame, 5IN1 Air brushless flight controller, 0802SE 23000KV motor and GF 40mm 2-blade props, ultra-lightweight feature | Update 5IN1 Air Brushless FC: The first 1S brushless FC that uses the G473 processor which has superior computing power, and is equipped with ICM42688P gyroscope, this all-in-one solution seamlessly integrates FC, ESC, OSD, RX and Onboard 5.8 25~400 VTX, weighing only 3.6g | Propulsion Systems: For a smooth and elegant free flight experience, the Air75 features the Gemfan 40mm 2-Blade Props, a larger pitch tip of the props, quick response, and crisp action, and 0802SE | 23000KV Motor, allowing for timely responses and precise follow-up actions for incredible speed bursts and agile steering | C03 Camera&Canapy: Experience high-quality images with the lightweight C03 FPV Micro Camera(1.45g). Redesigned Air Canopy for flexibility, impact resistance. Enhanced bending reduces breakage, improves explosion resistance. Supports Micro/Nano analog cameras, angle adjustable (25°-50°). With it, Air75 can chase the limit of racing victory worry less | Recommended Lipo Battery: Recommended with the ultralight LAVA 1S 450mAh 75C battery that features the groundbreaking Z-Folding Process for the Air75 more concentrated center gravity, crisper response, greater acceleration, and enhanced maneuverability
